notes: Spacious, well-maintained apartment with modern open-concept kitchen featuring gas stove, large refrigerator, and breakfast bar. Hardwood flooring throughout with good natural light from multiple windows. Balcony visible in one room has standard railings that may need baby-proofing; the kitchen island has metal bar stools with no backs which could be a tipping hazard for toddlers. Very clean and move-in ready condition.
